intro.description: This tutorial shows a number of scripts for XMPP + IO Data. When "Click to perform" is clicked, Bioclipse downloads the Gist and opens it in the Javascript Editor. The toolbar of this editor has a run button that should be used to execute the script.

item.title: Gist 106878: Connect to the XMPP server if not connected already
item.description: This script calls connects to the XMPP server if not connected already.

item.title: Gist 106880: Disconnect from the server
item.description: This script disconnects from the XMPP server.

item.title: Gist 106659: Do discovery on an XMPP item
item.description: This script does discovery on an XMPP item.

item.title: Gist 106665: Do asynchronous discovery on an XMPP item
item.description: Do asynchronous discovery on an XMPP item. Must be run from the Javascript Editor.

item.title: Gist 47421: Synchronous service invocation + using binding (HIVPred)
Gist 106022: Asynchronous service invocation (+ using binding)
